Posts.Content: Please feel free to remove this post. It's came to my knowledge fundraising for national cancer organizations is not okay on this forum. I apologize & thank you. Schieler Mew
Posts.Title: Raising Awareness For Prostate Cancer Research

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by Baz10 No it is not OK. It is totally against policy to fundraise on these forums. You have one opportunity to remove it, I being magnanamus today. Admins and mods, please leave in place, let's see how genuine this person is. Remove or be banned. As a group owner of a Facebook group consisting of 20,000 + active members I understand the forums position and will remove it promptly. Thanks for the heads up =-)
